price: Mu by’ukuri abantu bo mu ijuru kuri uwo munsi bazaba bahugijwe n’umunezero.
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
